name: Lights Out (itch) (MuchosWaffles)
description:
Made for Nokia Jam 3. The theme was "On/Off"

The WEBGL build is visually broken lol :'(    [sorry]

Controls :

  • WASD to  Walk
  • Left/Right Arrows to Turn
  • Space to Shoot
  • E to turn the lights on/off (lets you see ghosts/not see the map)
  • Esc to pause
  • Arrows navigate menu
  • Enter/Space to select while in menu

You can pretty much just kill enemies, then their ghosts while you follow the map. The ghosts can only be seen with the lights off and can drop health. Each floor gets harder up until the 10th one.  I didn't have a lot of time this week, so it's really simple and probably buggy af lol, but the jam was a lot of fun :)
